int is_valid(int current_state, int next_char) {

    // decode current_state into c0, c1, c2

    int c0 = current_state /16;

    int c1 = (current_state /4) %4;

    int c2 = current_state %4;

    int c3 = next_char;

    last4[2] = (c2 ==0 ? 'A' : (c2 ==1 ? 'C' : (c2 ==2 ? 'G' : 'T')));

    last4[3] = (c3 ==0 ? 'A' : (c3 ==1 ? 'C' : (c3 ==2 ? 'G' : 'T')));

    last4[4] = '\0';

    if ( (last4[0] == 'A' && last4[1] == 'G' && last4[2] == 'C') ||

         (last4[1] == 'A' && last4[2] == 'G' && last4[3] == 'C') ) {

        temp[i] = temp[i+1];

             (temp[1] == 'A' && temp[2] == 'G' && temp[3] == 'C') ) {

            return 0;

        }

    }

    return 1;

}
